section.p: Items on this list are planned items that aren't bugs or feature requests. Those are all listed in the sourceforge tracker. They are in no particular order.

ol.li: Have TopLevelWindow's deregister themselves with WebClient when they are closed
During form.reset, all submittable fields must revert back to their original values
Upgrade HttpClient to the latest gump version
HtmlTextArea.getText() and setText() currently don't modify the dom. This should be fixed
